entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • HttpResponseMessage #91036
  • illink roslyn analyzer: resolve code-style analysis warnings and update `MicrosoftCodeAnalysisCSharpCodeStyleVersion` to sync with `MicrosoftCodeAnalysisVersion_LatestVS` #91030
    8.0.0
  • coreclr/tools: resolve code-style analysis warnings and update `MicrosoftCodeAnalysisCSharpCodeStyleVersion` to sync with `MicrosoftCodeAnalysisVersion_LatestVS` #91028
    8.0.0
  • Tracking issue: Fix failing test on mono with static interface methods #91027
  • Retry Counts are high in Http3 Tests #91017
    9.0.0
  • Consider removing CORINFO_HELP_CHKCASTARRAY and CORINFO_HELP_ISINSTANCEOFARRAY from JIT/EE interface #91016
  • Test crashes on System.Net.Security Test Suite #91014
  • Add test for --make-repro-path ILC option #91013
    Future
  • InlineArray documentation tracking #91012
  • [wasm] perf pipeline broken - `Unable to determine the .NET SDK used for net8.0` on `main` #91011
    9.0.0
  • Can't build runtime with recent SDK due to `IsTrimmable` errors #91010
  • [API Proposal]: PeriodicTimer with CancellationToken support #91005
  • Improve the C++ codebase by consuming the GSL #91004
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add modern, span-based alternative to `StringInfo.GetTextElementEnumerator` #91003
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add TryGetOnlyChunk to StringBuilder #91000
  • [API Proposal]: Add `ToLowerOrdinal()` & `ToUpperOrdinal()` #90999
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add additional overloads for `Random.Next*` #90998
  • [API Proposal]: Add overload of `Type.GetMethod` that takes a name, generic parameter count, binding flags and parameter types #90995
  • [API Proposal]: Add `Type.IsReferenceType` #90993
  • [API Proposal]: Make `ValueTuple<>` implement `IFormattable` #90992
  • Options source generator shouldn't use random names #90990
    8.0.0
  • Config generator doesn't match nullability semantics of built-in Bind #90987
    8.0.0
  • ImmutableHashSet<T>.SetEquals always creates a new HashSet<T> #90986
    9.0.0
  • AddJwtBearer doesn't consider system proxy settings #90985
  • [browser] Support `WasmRuntimeAssetsLocation` in Wasm SDK #90979
    9.0.0
  • Microsoft.NET.CrossGen.targets: stop using legacy runtime graph #90977
    8.0.0
  • Config generator emits uncompilable code for certain type conflicts #90976
    8.0.0
  • Inconsistent behaviour between List<>.BinarySearch and ImmutableList<>.BinarySearch #90975
    9.0.0
  • Config generator wrongly emits init-related exception in bind operations #90974
    8.0.0
  • The "while" loop doesn't enter when it is referenced by an asynchronous method #90972
  • Config generator emits lambdas for error path that force allocation on success path #90971
    8.0.0

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Add span-based `StringInfo.GetNextTextElement` #91020
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: More customization of `DateTimeFormatInfo` #91002
    Future
  • [8.0] [wasm] Build failure: dotnet-install: Failed to check the disk space #91025
    8.0.0
  • Could not load file or assembly 'Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers #84995
    9.0.0
  • Port System.IO documentation for .NET 8.0 APIs #88568
    8.0.0
  • Config generator generates uncompilable code when there are two same-named types in two different namespaces #90969
  • InterfaceMap returns non-GenericMethodDefinition for static abstract interface generic methods on the target type #74132
    8.0.0
  • Equals on EventId from Microsoft.Extensions.Logging checks only ID #90831
    Future
  • Config generator is generating unnecessary support code for BindCore #90973
  • Test failure readytorun/GenericCycleDetection/Depth3Test/Depth3Test.sh #88586
    8.0.0
  • [Test Failure] System.Net.Sockets.Tests.SocketAsyncEventArgsTest.Finalizer_InvokedWhenNoLongerReferenced #89089
  • Allow SDKs to tweak the error message when ILLink fails #90607
    9.0.0
  • Performance regression, memory usage #90899
    8.0.0
  • ObjectDisposedException intermittently crashes test process from DefaultHttpClientFactory.ExpiryTimer_Tick #90919
    8.0.0
  • System.Net.Sockets.SocketException (995) -System.IO.IOException #90338
    9.0.0
  • IOS Push Notification Sending Failed with SSL Connection Error #86214
  • Assertion failed in loader: , condition `<disabled>' not met #73617
    9.0.0
  • Test failure System.IO.Tests.FileSystemWatcherTests_netstandard17.DroppedWatcher_Collectible #86564
    8.0.0
  • Test failure System.Threading.ThreadPools.Tests.ThreadPoolTests.FileStreamFlushAsyncThreadPoolDeadlockTest #89702
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Implement standalone GC loading in NativeAOT #91038
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • NativeAOT SuperPMI collections #91037
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert all `EnC_SUPPORTED` to `FEATURE_ENC_SUPPORTED` #91035
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Address warnings from Microsoft.CodeAnalysis upgrade #91034
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Include dotnet/hostfxr/hostpolicy symbols in Microsoft.NETCore.App.Host/Runtime packages #91031
    area-Host
  • [NOT READY] GC: Rearrange finalization queue to put freelist in middle #91029
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [main] Forward port metrics tests #91026
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric
  • Implement IDirectoryContents on PhysicalDirectoryInfo #91024
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-FileSystem, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] wasm-tools: Fix workload manifest MSI ProductVersion generation #91023
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix nullability annotations of MemberDescriptor.AttributeArray #91022
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Fix perf pipeline build with 9.0 sdk #91021
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [mono][wip] Test linux-x64 full AOT llvm job #91019
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • Delete some dead code` #91018
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] wasm-tools: Fix workload manifest MSI ProductVersion generation #91015
    Servicing-consider, area-Workloads
  • [mono] Handle enum return type when inlining CreateInstance #91008
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Remove --skip-unresolved from illink #91007
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Upgrade MicrosoftCodeAnalysisVersion_LatestVS version to 4.7.0 #91006
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 9.0.0
  • Opportunistically use stack allocation for GC dynamic events #91001
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Revert "Fix incomplete type errors when debugging in lldb/gdb (#90873)" #90997
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] wasm-tools: Fix workload manifest MSI ProductVersion generation #90994
    Servicing-consider, area-Workloads
  • JIT: Remove a quirk in fgMorphLeafLocal #90988
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Enable `System.IO.Hashing` tests on ios and disable them on tvos #90984
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: Remove TYP_BOOL #90981
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Don't allocate jiterpreter AOT tables unless AOT was enabled at build time #90978
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Improve CopySign performance for integer types #90970
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] Fix calling existing ctor with MethodInvoker; share tests with invokers #90968
    area-System.Reflection

Merged

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2251098 #90996
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0] [mono][interp] Mask all shift amounts #90991
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] [NativeAOT] Fix `--make-repro-path` ILC option #90989
    Servicing-approved, area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Only initialize listeners once #90932
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 8.0.0
  • Fix JIT_ByRefWriteBarrier unwinding on macOS x64 #90967
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Support assignment to multiple refs in trim analyzer #90936
    Servicing-approved, linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/8.0] Fix Type.ContainsGenericParameters for function pointers #90963
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Reflection
  • [release/8.0] Remove dbgshim from platform manifest #90924
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-installer
  • [release/8.0] Fix config names for CallCountThreshold and CallCountingDelayMs #90841
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Bring AggressiveOptimization back on AwaitUnsafeOnCompleted #90980
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices
  • [NativeAOT] Fix `--make-repro-path` ILC option #90935
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] [mono] Add telemetry for AndroidStripILAfterAOT #90956
    Servicing-approved, needs-area-label, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] [mono] Initialize module's image ALC for dynamic objects #90912
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-meta-mono, 8.0.0
  • [browser] Update browser template to use Wasm SDK #90871
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [Mono] Update file owner for simd related files #90807
    area-Meta
  • [mono][interp] Mask all shift amounts #90666
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [mono] Add telemetry for AndroidStripILAfterAOT #90950
    area-Build-mono
  • Bring AggressiveOptimization back on AwaitUnsafeOnCompleted #90966
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices
  • Delete duplicate init-distro-rid.sh #90952
    area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm] Perf pipeline - use `stable` version of `v8` #90961
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, perf-pipeline
  • [release/8.0] [NativeAOT] Missing memory fence before bulk move of objects #90941
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Bump main version to 9.0-alpha1 #90558
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0

Updated

  • Upgrade all VMs to AMD64 Ubuntu 22.04 #86194
    area-Infrastructure
  • Enable rule CA1869 - Cache and reuse 'JsonSerializerOptions' #90895
    area-Meta, 9.0.0
  • Clean up AggressiveOpt tier in vm #90504
    area-TieredCompilation-coreclr
  • Tar: Only treat reparse points marked as junctions or symlinks as actual tar symlinks #89102
    area-System.Formats.Tar
  • [6.0] Fix session-local named mutex compat issue #90344
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Threading, 6.0.x
  • [PERF] Add hybrid globalization testing runs #89825
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix a deadlock in NonGC + Profiler API #90847
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix stack_limit handling #90937
    area-GC-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add tests for `GetInterfaceMap` on static interface methods #90518
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Add New Test to Monitor Number of Jitted Methods #90681
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Expose a `Lock` type in preview mode #87672
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Extend mono_gsharedvt_constrained_call JIT icall to handle static virtual methods #90875
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Upgrade our TFM to net9.0 #90880
    area-Infrastructure
  • Just running tests with new EH enabled on all platforms #90790
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-VM-coreclr
  • Check for generic structs in "needs marshalling" check #90836
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • `PEImage` should not permit `m_path` field mutation #90753
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0-staging] [hot_reload] ignore modified MONO_TABLE_TYPEDEF rows in update #90172
    Servicing-approved, area-EnC-mono, 7.0.x
  • Move event pipe utf8/utf16 string conversion functions to shared event pipe code #90774
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Change LoadDomainInfo to honor requested LDAP port #89787
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • [Docs][tests] Add Mono Profiled AOT Functional Test and doc #90959
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Regression test for issue #86993 #90906
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add check that tests are public #89554
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix UseManagedNtlm linker Substitutions #90957
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Port NativeAOT exception handling to CoreCLR #88034
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Fix MarshalStructAsLayoutSeq #90719
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Add log level and keyword tests for NativeRuntimeEventSource #89816
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Format/Parse binary from/to BigInteger #85392
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Expose extension points needed by UnityLinker. #90688
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [wasm] Add a dependency on dotnet/installer to get the latest #90904
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Implement MVP part of const generics for CoreCLR #89636
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Perf optimized find last non-zero element #90960
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Upgrade wasm helix VMs to ubuntu 22.04 #90881
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • SPMI: Fix recording/replay of getExactClasses #90926
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Fix tmpReg in emitInsTernary #90770
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-23
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT LLVM] DllImport / LibraryImport doesn't automatically produce imports on wasi-wasm #2383
  • [NativeAOT LLVM] Using together with .NET 8 SDK #2235

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Support emulated unwinding for WASI #2387

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Clean up the usage document #2382
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • Inflate improvements #2380

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] WASI fixes #2386
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Rewrite exception handling to support nested dispatch #2374
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Publishing R2R for multiple RIDs with AppendRuntimeIdentifierToOutputPath set to false results in the first set of R2R binaries being coped into every RID publish folder #34884
  • [API Compat] Changing a member return type should be detected as a breaking change #34864
    9.0.1xx
  • Container image built using source-built SDK may fail to run #34860
  • NU5128 warning inconsistency? What am I missing? #34859
  • MAUI application throws error when microsoft.intune.maui.essentials.android package is installed. #34857
  • Lots weird things in net20/35 output #34853
  • Implicit framework reference not include System.Windows.Forms for net20 #34852
  • Issue with dotnet build on directory with URL escaped character #34851

Closed

  • "dotnet run" not correctly handling Chinese characters input via Console.ReadLine() in Debug mode #33575

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2250950 #34880
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 20.4.0 to 20.8.1 in /eng/dependabot #34879
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 20.4.0 to 20.8.1 in /eng/dependabot #34878
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: main
  • Test for aot library with eventpipe #34873
    untriaged, Area-NativeAOT
  • Validate member types #34872
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • Validate "this" extension methods and limit visibility #34871
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Containers: prefer starting the app using 'dotnet <assembly.dll>'. #34863
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'main' #34854
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Update dependabot.yml to target 8.0.1xx #34848
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Make illink error less specific #34806
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'main' #34819
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Make UseRidGraph property map to runtime config option #34836
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK

Updated

  • Update our TFM support and error messaging for 17.7 #34585
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Download tool packages from NuGet feeds directly, instead of implicitly restoring #33835
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 20.4.0 to 20.8.0 in /eng/dependabot #34788
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: 7.0.4xx
  • Crossplatform ResourceUpdater #34394
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-23
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [Proposal]: Action lambda assignment syntax sugar #7485

Updated

  • Disallow interfaces with static virtual members as type arguments #5955
  • `is` expression evaluating `const` expression should be considered constant #6926

PullRequests

Updated

  • Ref assignment switch expressions #7352

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • AdditionalFile fixers don't run on up-to-date versions of documents #69689
  • invokenavigatetoforgeneratedfile_infolder failures #69686
  • Usings do not collapse in C# #69685
  • Incorrect Single Line Property Formatting Despite Appropriate Setting in Visual Studio 2022 17.8 Preview 1 #69682
  • MissingMethodException for init setters #69678
  • Collection expressions: optimize calculation of iteration type #69676
    17.8
  • Consider move length-based string dispatch behind /optimize #69674
  • VBCSCompiler: Infinite build time #69672
  • Required project reference when using transitive source generator dependencies #69668

Closed

  • Compiler crashes when emitting EnC delta for assembly with synthesized inline array types #69398
    17.8
  • IsRecord returns false for record structs read from metadata #69326
    17.9
  • Allocation issues in SplitRawLineIntoFormattedLines #69675
    Next
  • Completion doesn't offer `method` completion for class with a primary constructor #69535
  • FindReferencesAsync() not finding references if dependencies are transitive #69679
  • Cover additional cases in implicit object creation analyzer #57789
    Backlog
  • async exception bug #69667
  • Inconsistent behaviour of source code generators in VS 2022 #69633

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix import completion in LSP workspace #69691
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce overhead due to lsp semantic token refresh requests. #69690
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Identify and fix simple using statements in top level expressions #69688
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Fix issue where dedenting a namespace did not dedent raw string literals #69684
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Lower the priority of 'Convert number' and have nested options when there is a long list. #69683
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Adjust OptProf config #69681
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Avoid static overhead for switch-over-string optimization #69673
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve interpolated string handler compilation error #69671
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.8
  • Update TFM in tests to net8.0 #69669
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Implement support for emitting PrivateImplementationDetails to EnC deltas #69485
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Collection expressions: overload resolution #69594
    New Feature - Collection Expressions, Next
  • Recommend `method` on primary constructors #69536
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to main #69687
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Update rule ID for 'Unnecessary call to Set.Contains' #69282
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, Next
  • Update doc for IsRecord #69607
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce unnecessary allocations in metadata-as-source #69677
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.7 to release/dev17.8 #69680
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Offer 'use implicit object' in a few more apparent locations #69651
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Stabilize LongInitializers test #69666
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
  • Update Versions.props for 17.8 P2 #69260
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Fix CSharpSyntaxContext when dealing with UTF8 string literals #69650
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: use inline arrays for collection expressions with span target types #69412
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.8
  • Run design time builds out-of-process #69616
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Make the [Experimental] warning as error by default #69639
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Provide dedicated classifications for embedded C# in test code. #61197
    Area-IDE
  • Collection expression conversions: check elements are convertible #69627
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Pool lexed token arrays in SyntaxParser. #69499
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Rename Razor compiler assemblies #69655
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2250854 #69366

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Obtaining aspnet parameter binding metadata #50300
  • Make IEmailSender more easily customizable #50298
    8.0-rc2
  • MapIdentityApi email confirmation links uses relative instead of absolute URLs #50296
    8.0-rc2
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #50295
  • Blazor - WebAssembly `build_id` section #50294
  • Rename Blazor WebAssembly project to Blazor WebAssembly Standalone #50292
    8.0-rc2
  • [Blazor] Disable enhanced navigation on a per-element basis #50290
  • Support Razor Component endpoints for UseExceptionHandler #50287
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Navigate to a different page from SignalR hub event handler #50286
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Blazor-Server-Side: Concurrency Exception While Rendering `_Host.cshtml` #50284
  • Perf regression: fortunes #50283
  • Perf improvement: endpoint, multiple_queries #50282
  • Increased connections size after migrating from dotnetcore 3.1 to 7 #50280

Closed

  • APIs for identity management #47288
    8.0-rc1
  • Make the PageTitle-component able to be set with prerendering turned off #50267
  • API review: Component rendering to HTML for libraries (outside Blazor) #47018
    8.0-rc2
  • API review: Components SSR streaming and render modes #50057
    8.0-rc2
  • API review: Components SSR Forms #50078
    8.0-rc2
  • API review: RazorComponentResult #47096
    8.0-rc2
  • NativeAOT with reflection disabled working in .NET 7, not in .NET 8 for new KestrelServer #50255
  • Negotiate auth leads to disconnection when posting large request to a kestrel API #50289
  • SignInManager Namespace Missing on .NET 8 Perview version #50232
  • Give Blazor SSR access to HTTP Context #50185
  • Provide APIs related to controlling the TLS handshake process #50291
  • Blazor SSR APIs for accessing HttpContext without IHttpContextAccessor #48769
    8.0-rc2
  • NavigationManager doesn't navigate relative to the base address when using Blazor SSR #49670
    8.0-rc2
  • SSR/server interactivity Error Boundary not working with Blazor Web App Pre6/7 #49679
    8.0-rc2
  • Blazor issue with routing and - separator #49691
    8.0-rc2
  • HttpNavigationManager already initialized on Blazor SSR. #49456
    8.0-rc2
  • QuickGrid: Add arbitrary attributes splatting. #50285
  • Perf improvement: caching, multiple_queries #50189
  • Perf improvement: plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #50269

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove more setup overhead in RDG benchmarks #50302
    area-runtime
  • Make IEmailSender more customizable #50301
    area-identity
  • Start using the .NET 9 Planning milestone in issue response automation #50299
    area-infrastructure
  • Use absolute URLs for confirmation emails #50297
    area-identity
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #50281
    area-infrastructure, area-runtime, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:

Merged

  • API review followups #50181
    area-blazor, 8.0-rc2
  • Fix SSR redirection when coming from a non-root URL #50261
    area-blazor, 8.0-rc2
  • Ensure enhanced nav requests have the correct headers #50263
    area-blazor, 8.0-rc2
  • In SSR, supply HttpContext as cascading value #50253
    area-blazor, 8.0-rc2
  • Unquarantine tests as part of blops. #50279
    area-signalr, 9.0-preview1
  • Remove reflection from KestrelServer constructor #50272
    area-runtime, 8.0-rc2

Updated

  • HttpLogging redaction and enrichment #50163
    area-middleware, 8.0-rc2
  • Support hot reload for Blazor component endpoints #50031
    area-blazor
  • [release/8.0] Update SDK #50276
    area-infrastructure
  • [Blazor] Close the circuit when all Blazor Server components are disposed #50170
    area-blazor
  • Update SDK to 8.0.100-rc.1.23407.2 #49911
    area-infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2250904 #49575
    area-mvc
  • Make MapIdentityApi DTOs public #50247
    area-identity
  • Persist Prerendered State #50146
    area-blazor

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Existing TextDecorations applied to a Label are not removed when a new TextDecoration value is set after the Label's Text has been modified #16967
  • Nested CollectionViews aren't rendered correctly in iOS and MacCatalyst #16966

  • Android CollectionView leaks if given a header or footer #16961
    Backlog
  • AppThemeBinding in VisualState prevents from updating Button.Background #16960
    Backlog

  • Make KeyboardAutoManager public #16949
    Backlog
  • codesign exited with code 1 #16948
  • Button control's IsEnabled property not works if used with Command property. #16947
    Backlog
  • Black splash screen on iOS device and simulator #16945

  • Cursor position is at the beginning of entry/editor #14707

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Native AOT - Microsoft.Data.SQLite crashing on SqliteConnection.Open() #31541
  • Model with multiple nested owned entities and properties of same types within a single entity throws InvalidOperationException #31540
  • Memory Issue with EF Core 7 DbContext ServiceProviderCache #31539
  • EF Core does not include boolean column with default value in SQL INSERT statement #31538
  • Linq Ef Core query doesn't include filter parameter for join table if not set in the same () parentheses #31536
  • When a parent and child entity has a one to many relationship and the child table is a temporal table, removing a child from its parent collection will trigger an unexpected error. #31535

Closed

  • What's the diff between `[Index(nameof(Email), IsUnique = true), Index(nameof(Title), IsUnique = true)]` and `[Index(nameof(Email), nameof(Title), IsUnique = true)]`? #31537

PullRequests

Merged

  • [release/8.0] Update SDK #31534
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #31542
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Updated

  • Microsoft.Data.Sqlite: Only try sqlite3_win32_set_directory on Windows and be more resilient #31532
  • 31355: SQLite: Add EF.Functions.Unhex #31454
  • Update SDK #31533
